overview: As their wedding day approaches, bride-to-be Laney, has an innocent wish to ask of the only man she has ever been with, her future husband Cody: before they marry, she would like to see "another man's thing". But when one wish turns into two, then two turns into three, Cody's love for Laney is put to the test with each of his Fiance's wishes...
title: My Fiancee's Wishes
